channel.title: USPTO Other Events
channel.description: This feed provides easy access to USPTO Other events.

item.title: Advancing research on inventor demographics
Propiedad intelectual 101
item.description: ¿Desea familiarizarse con las patentes, las marcas registradas, los derechos de autor, y los secretos comerciales? De ser así, le invitamos para que aprenda acerca de los fundamentos básicos de la propiedad intelectual (PI) y las formas potenciales de proteger sus innovaciones durante su transición de una idea al producto.

item.title: Propiedad intelectual 101
item.description: ¿Desea familiarizarse con las patentes, las marcas registradas, los derechos de autor, y los secretos comerciales? De ser así, le invitamos para que aprenda acerca de los fundamentos básicos de la propiedad intelectual (PI) y las formas potenciales de proteger sus innovaciones durante su transición de una idea al producto.

item.title: Intellectual property 101
item.description: Do you want to know more about patents, trademarks, copyrights, and trade secrets? Join us for a free, virtual session to learn about intellectual property (IP) basics and potential ways to protect your innovations as you transition from idea to product.

item.title: Intellectual property 101
item.description: Do you want to know more about patents, trademarks, copyrights, and trade secrets? Join us for a free, virtual session to learn about intellectual property (IP) basics and potential ways to protect your innovations as you transition from idea to product.

item.description: Are you interested in learning more about patent searching?

item.title: Resources for inventors, innovators, and entrepreneurs
item.description: Are you new to the world of patents and trademarks and need some help?

item.title: U.S.—China 2022 developments in trademark law and practice perspectives
Getting started with Patent Public Search: An overview
item.description: Are you puzzled by patent searching or confused by the patent searching options available on the internet? Whether you are a novice searcher or an experienced one, the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) is here to help.

item.title: Strategies for biotech and medtech startups: Successfully navigating the USPTO and FDA
item.description: Hear industry professionals and government officials from the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) and the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) discuss the intricacies biotech and medtech independent inventors and startups face when securing intellectual property (IP) rights from the USPTO and seeking regulatory approval from the FDA. Space is limited, so register early.

item.title: Patent Public Search: Advanced tips for frequent searchers
item.description: Want to learn more about how the United States Patent and Trademark Office's (USPTO) new Patent Public Search tool can improve your patent searching?

item.title: International agents and attorneys: Learn to think like a patent examiner with STEPP's four-day course - RESCHEDULED
item.description: If you are a United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) registered patent attorney or an agent residing internationally (i.e. outside of the United States), you can get a better understanding of how patent examiners make decisions at the Stakeholder Training on Examination Practice and Procedure (STEPP) agent/attorney four-day course, held from September 13-16, 2022.

item.title: International agents and attorneys: Learn to think like a patent examiner with STEPP's four-day course - RESCHEDULED
item.description: If you are a United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) registered patent attorney or an agent residing internationally (i.e. outside of the United States), you can get a better understanding of how patent examiners make decisions at the Stakeholder Training on Examination Practice and Procedure (STEPP) agent/attorney four-day course, held from September 13-16, 2022.

item.title: Patent basics
item.description: Are you interested in learning about the basics of intellectual property (IP) and patents?

item.title: Patent basics
item.description: Are you interested in learning about the basics of intellectual property (IP) and patents?

item.title: International agents and attorneys: Learn to think like a patent examiner with STEPP's four-day course - RESCHEDULED
item.description: If you are a United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) registered patent attorney or an agent residing internationally (i.e. outside of the United States), you can get a better understanding of how patent examiners make decisions at the Stakeholder Training on Examination Practice and Procedure (STEPP) agent/attorney four-day course, held from September 13-16, 2022.

item.title: Fundamentos básicos de las patentes
item.description: Si tiene una invención o una idea para un posible producto, no se pierda esta oportunidad. Exploraremos las diferentes clases o tipos de patentes, incluyendo patentes de utilidad, patentes de diseño, y patentes de plantas. Adicionalmente, explicaremos la diferencia y el uso de solicitudes (aplicaciones) de patentes provisionales y no-provisionales.

item.title: International agents and attorneys: Learn to think like a patent examiner with STEPP's four-day course - RESCHEDULED
item.description: If you are a United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) registered patent attorney or an agent residing internationally (i.e. outside of the United States), you can get a better understanding of how patent examiners make decisions at the Stakeholder Training on Examination Practice and Procedure (STEPP) agent/attorney four-day course, held from September 13-16, 2022.

item.title: Fundamentos básicos de las marcas registradas
item.description: Esta sesión es imprescindible para cualquier emprendedor o negocio pequeño interesado en obtener una marca registrada. Exploraremos los tipos diferentes de marcas registradas, incluyendo nombres de las marcas, diseños, logotipos, e imágenes comerciales.

Intellectual property basics and helpful resources
item.description: Unfamiliar with patents, trademarks, copyrights, and trade secrets? Don't miss this opportunity to learn from United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) experts about intellectual property (IP) basics and potential ways to protect your innovation as you transition from idea to product.

item.title: Intellectual property basics and helpful resources
item.description: Unfamiliar with patents, trademarks, copyrights, and trade secrets? Don't miss this opportunity to learn from United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) experts about intellectual property (IP) basics and potential ways to protect your innovation as you transition from idea to product.

item.title: Blockchain & IP: USC 101 patent eligibility in blockchain
item.description: Claims define the boundaries of intellectual property just as property lines define the boundaries of a house. Over the past few years, USC 101 has been clarified regarding patent eligibility as inventions in the digital space because they do not always produce tangible end results.

item.title: Blockchain & IP: USC 101 patent eligibility in blockchain
item.description: Claims define the boundaries of intellectual property just as property lines define the boundaries of a house. Over the past few years, USC 101 has been clarified regarding patent eligibility as inventions in the digital space because they do not always produce tangible end results.

item.title: Trademark Public Advisory Committee quarterly meeting
item.description: Attend the next quarterly meeting of the United States Patent and Trademark Office's (USPTO) Trademark Public Advisory Committee (TPAC) to learn more about trademark-related policies, goals, performance, budgets, and user fees. The TPAC advises the Under Secretary of Commerce for Intellectual Property and Director of the USPTO. The public meeting agenda will be available one week before the scheduled meeting.

item.title: Trademark Public Advisory Committee quarterly meeting
item.description: Attend the next quarterly meeting of the United States Patent and Trademark Office's (USPTO) Trademark Public Advisory Committee (TPAC) to learn more about trademark-related policies, goals, performance, budgets, and user fees. The TPAC advises the Under Secretary of Commerce for Intellectual Property and Director of the USPTO. The public meeting agenda will be available one week before the scheduled meeting.

item.title: LEAP to Chambers
item.description: Join the Patent Trial and Appeal Board's (PTAB) Legal Experience and Advancement Program (LEAP) for its brand new event, LEAP to Chambers! This event will take place on Wednesday, November 9, 2022, from 10 a.m. to noon.

item.title: Blockchain & IP: Stakeholder spotlight
item.description: Hear about the innovations and inventions in supply chain management, credit cards, insurance, and banking that companies along the United States Eastern seaboard are pursuing. These real-world use cases will delight and inspire your outlook of the future.
